section_title: POZNAN STRATEGIC PROGRAMME ON TECHNOLOGY TRANSFER
sentences: SBI Chair Yauvoli invited parties to consider the GEF report on progress made in carrying out the Poznan strategic programme on technology transfer (FCCC/SBI/2015/INF.4) and the interim report by the Technology Executive Committee (TEC) on the evaluation of the programme (FCCC/SBI/2015/INF.5).
Informal consultations will be co-facilitated by Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Elfriede More (Austria).
